content.rendered:
About Me

Joyce joined Regent College London in October 2019 and has over 13 years’ experience of managing statutory returns including HESA, HESES, Provider Profile, ITT and Aggregate offshore returns within the higher education sector in a variety of corporate and operational roles. Joyce has a diverse and complementary range of skills, combining leadership, strategic planning, project management, excellent communication skills and technical competency with extensive experience of working in large Universities and including managing staff and resources.

Key responsibilities

  • Managing the submission of the annual statutory HESA Student Return, Transparency and Unistats return ensuring that accurate, credible and timely data is submitted.
  • Analysing and preparing and submitting, the Higher Education Student Early Statistics (HESES) return to Office for Students (OfS).
  • To analyse and interpret new HESA requirements in relation to student information and to develop and implement procedural or technical changes to meet these requirements, in collaboration with relevant colleagues.
  • Project managing internal data audit in relation to the submission of HESA returns and HESES.
